title: Neural Bikes
body: Receive custom tailored bike sharing demand predictions. Using the power of neural networks Neural bikes lets you know if you're gonna be able to have a bike free at your desired time.

title: Prediction Graphs
body: Get detailed information of the live performance of all of the stations

title: Privacy Policy
body:
Neural Bikes does not share any data with third parties. It does not contain any ads so all of your information remains safe.
Location access is only required to locate you in the map and show closest anotations.
